location.en: You can find that shit at:
location.cy: Gallwch ddod o hyd y cachu yn:

forkedrepo.en: {name} is a forked {language} repo with {open_issues} unresolved issues [{forks}F {watchers}W]
forkedrepo.cy: {name} ydy archif {language} fforchog gyda {open_issues} materion heb eu datrys [{forks}F {watchers}W]

unforkedrepo.en: {name} is a {language} repo with {open_issues} unresolved issues [{forks}F {watchers}W]
unforkedrepo.cy: {name} ydy archif {language} gyda {open_issues} materion heb eu datrys [{forks}F {watchers}W]

issuenotfound.cy: Wedi methu dod o hyd mater hwnnw

commitcountboring.en: My code has been committed {count} times.
commitcountboring.cy: Mae fy cod wedi cael ei gyflawni ar {count} adegau.

commitcountfun.en: My repository has the same number of commits as {fact} ({count}).
commitcountfun.cy: Yr un nifer o ymrwymo fel {fact} gan fy archif ({count}).

commitcountyear.en: My repository's commits number {count}, the year that {fact}.
commitcountyear.cy: Nifer o ymrwymo gan fy archif: {count}, y flwyddyn y {fact}.
